description:
- Holds 28 ounces of liquid
- Sleek, curved design allows for easy and versatile grip. Hands-free pressure-release dispenser tip allows for easy use on or off the field
- SureShot valve provides a steady stream and reduces leaking and spilling
- Screw-on lid with wide opening
- Fast-Cap makes it easy to remove, fill and go
- Bottle and cap are BPA-free
- As seen on sidelines everywhere - Look and hydrate like the pros

Keep hydration handy for your next practice or big game with the Gatorade 28 oz squeeze bottle. A sideline staple, this bottle keeps drinks cold and players performing at their peak. This Gatorade bottle is designed with a Fast-Cap that simplifies your refueling process so you can quickly fill your bottle up and get back out there to make your moves. The contour bottle design offers up durability and a comfortable, versatile grip.
title: Gatorade® 28oz Squeeze Water Bottle - Green
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Clean with Water and mild Soap

description: Mix and enjoy your favorite drink all in one cup with the BlenderBottle Classic Water Bottle -32oz. This best-selling shaker bottle uses a patented stainless steel ball to thoroughly mix ingredients as you shake. It's a convenient and portable must-have addition to your daily protein shake or smoothie routine.
title: BlenderBottle® Classic™ Water Bottle - 32 oz

bullets: Shaker cup uses patented surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall to mix as you shake
Ergonomic flip cap with tapered spout
Perfect for protein shakes, smoothies, pancake batter & more
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description: Mix up delicious shakes with the Blender Bottle Classic with Loop 32-oz. SportMixer in Black. Choose your own ingredients, drop in the blender ball and start shaking. The movement of the ball creates smooth, lump-free shakes every time. The bottle fits into most cup holders and the leak-proof lid won't make a mess in your car.
title: BlenderBottle® Classic 32oz Water Bottle
bullet_description: Style and color assortment may vary

description: From the office to outdoor adventures, make this sturdy and stylish Wide Mouth Water Bottle from Gaiam your handy companion. This stunning water bottle comes with a unique pattern and double-wall insulation to keep cold beverages cold or offers a sip of steaming hot coffee when the temperature dips — providing the drink of your choice at any time. Made from sturdy stainless steel for long-lasting use and durability, this water bottle comes with a wide mouth to pop in ice cubes on those hot, summer days. The slim construction of this water bottle allows for easy carry in your bag as well as fits in standard car and bike bottle holders.
title: Gaiam® 18oz Wide Mouth Water Bottle

bullets: Sleek and stylish stainless steel water bottle takes care of all your hydration needs
Double stainless steel wall for long-lasting durability
Leakproof stainless steel cap prevents any messy spills
Slim handle on the lid makes for easy carrying
Patterned water bottle adds a fun pop of style to your day
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description: The BlenderBottle® Classic revolutionized the industry back in 2004 with its leak-proof seal, iconic design, and the BlenderBall® wire whisk. Now, years later, it's still the best-selling portable mixer on the market. Why? Because it works.Mix up smooth, lump-free shakes by simply adding your ingredients, dropping in the BlenderBall, and shaking. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. Made of 316 surgical-grade stainless steel, the BlenderBall is designed to remain in the bottle until you've enjoyed its contents. Just drinking water? Feel free to leave the ball inside - it'll never rust, chip, or peel.The BlenderBottle Classic features a wide mouth opening, embossed ounce and milliliter markings, and fits in most cup holders for added convenience.
title: BlenderBottle® 32oz Classic Water Bottle - Black
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe top rack only, Clean with Water and mild Soap

description:
"INSULATED WATER BOTTLE

The Polar Bottle dual-wall insulation design features a reflective foil layer between an inner and outer bottle to keep liquids cool twice as long as standard water bottles. The foil layer reflects the sunlight, while the inner and outer bottle create an insulating air barrier. Polar Bottle is the originator of this design, and remains one of the top performing insulated squeeze bottles on the market."
title: Polar® 24oz Insulated Water Bottle - Blue/Silver

bullets: Removable CarryLoop™ and drinking valve for easy cleaning
Wide mouth for easy cleaning and ice cubes
Double wall insulated – keeps water cold twice as long
Fits stand bike cages and most cupholders
Backed by a lifetime guarantee and free replacement caps

description:

Double-wall construction keeps water cold twice as long as regular sport bottles

Also keeps warm beverages warm during cool weather rides

description:
- Perfect for mixing Gatorade protein powder shakes and more
- 28-ounce capacity; marked measurements on the bottle go to 20 ounces
- Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups
- Secure screw-on lid, a wide mouth for easy mixing, loop top, ergonomic flip cap, and tapered spout
- Dishwasher safe, BPA- and phthalate-free

Shake up your recovery with the Gatorade protein Blender Bottle - the perfect companion for on-the-go use to and from the gym, the field or wherever you may work up a sweat. The updated BlenderBottle adds a new, convenient carrying loop and flip cap design to the world’s best-selling shaker cup. The BlenderBall wire whisk moves freely inside the bottle as you shake, mixing even the thickest ingredients with ease. The BlenderBottle Classic features a secure screw-on lid, a wide mouth for easy mixing, and embossed markings that measure both ounces and milliliters. The BlenderBottle Classic is dishwasher safe, BPA- and phthalate-free . Perfect for mixing and enjoying your favorite flavor of Gatorade Recover protein shakes.
title: Gatorade® BlenderBottle® 28oz Shaker Bottle - Clear/Orange
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Clean with Water and mild Soap

description: The perfect solution for keeping an athlete hydrated on the field.  The curved straw is great for sports using helmets or face guards.  It is also convenient for use when reclined in a chair or bed.  The 1L bottle is made out of LDPE and is BPA free.

description: O2COOL's ArcticSqueeze is the perfect drinking bottle for your bike, sporting or outdoor activity. This product is flexible, easy to squeeze and provides you with a high flow rate of water and a fine mist to cool you down. Its insulated design keeps your water colder longer. O2COOL’s patented Mist 'N Sip products provide a unique combination all in one - Misting and Drinking. The mist feature helps to cool you down on the outside while you stay hydrated on the inside. We offer a wide selection of different drinking and bottle options to quench your fitness and outdoor thirst.
title: O2Cool® Mist 'N Sip® ArcticSqueeze® 20oz Double-Walled Water Bottle - Light Green

bullets: Double-wall construction eliminates sweating and keeps beverages cold up to 50% longer
Built-in carry loop for easy transport

description: Carry supplements, snacks, pills and more-all in the same bottle. The BlenderBottle® ProStak® is the ultimate all-in-one shaker cup, offering a variety of features to make on-the-go nutrition easier than ever.Like all BlenderBottle® brand shaker cups, the ProStak utilizes the BlenderBall® wire whisk to deliver smooth, great-tasting drinks. Simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle as you shake, mixing drinks to a smooth consistency, every time.Not quite ready to mix your shake? Need to pack an extra snack for later in the day? The ProStak's unique Twist n' Lock storage jar easily attaches and detaches from to the bottom of the bottle, offering compact storage that's available right when you need it.The ProStak also features a unique, space-saving pill tray that locks into the jar lid, allowing you to carry both vitamins and powders in the same bottle.The BlenderBottle ProStak features a wide mouth opening, embossed ounce and milliliter markings, and a patent-pending carry loop for added portability.
title: BlenderBottle® ProStak 22oz Water Bottle - Pink
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe top rack only, Clean with Water and mild Soap

description:
Maintain proper nutrition on the go with the BlenderBottle® SportMixer®. Featuring the BlenderBall® wire whisk, the SportMixer does double duty as a water bottle and shaker cup, allowing you to mix protein, nutrition, and meal replacement shakes anytime, anywhere.

To mix up a smooth, lump-free shake, simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. Made of 316 surgical-grade stainless steel, the BlenderBall is designed to remain in the bottle until you've enjoyed its contents. Just drinking water? Feel free to leave the ball inside - it'll never rust, chip, or peel.

The SportMixer’s BPA-free Eastman Tritan plastic is stain and odor resistant, allowing you to enjoy today’s smoothie without tasting last week’s protein shake. Other design elements include a unique SportLoop for easy carrying, and rubberized over molding on the lid and grip for a firm hold.

Designed with equal parts style, innovation, and versatility, the BlenderBottle SportMixer rises to the challenge of your active and busy lifestyle.

· 28 oz capacity

· Top-rack dishwasher safe

· BPA and Phthalate free
title: BlenderBottle® Sportmixer 28oz - Pink
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe top rack only, Clean with Water and mild Soap

The powerful perfect squeeze bottle is a high-quality sports bottle equipped with a built-in one-way flow Valve to prevent leaking. This one-handed plastic water bottle features a high flow rate for efficient hydration during any sports activity. Don't let the looks fool you; this water bottle is rugged and is top-rack dishwasher safe. Fill up with powerful powdered sports drink or liquid drops mixed with water and ice for an environmentally conscious way to rehydrate to your maximum performance. No plastic odors or taste because this 32oz water bottle is made out of FDA-approved, BPA-free Tritan plastic.Durable yet pliable construction engineered for maximum performance and squeezability
